t: Amazon.com: B. Smith with Style
s: B. Smith is an American lifestyle icon. She was a Black-owned business entrepreneur, restaurateur, author, television host, and cover model. The design team that B. personally selected for her namesake home style line reflects her passion for bringing a diverse group of people together under one stylish umbrella. They continue B.’s legacy with new collections inspired by her style guides, brand ...

t: B. Smith - Wikipedia
s: August 14, 2024 - Smith was born on August 24, 1949, in the Pittsburgh suburb of Everson, Pennsylvania. Her mother, Florence, was a maid and her father, William, a steelworker. Smith was raised in Scottdale, Pennsylvania, and attended Southmoreland High School, being graduated in 1967.
